SELECT /*com.wigo.cmm.sys.dao.NtcartBasDao.selectList*/ NTCART_ID /*게시물ID */ , BRD_ID /*게시판ID */ , UP_NTCART_ID /*상위게시물ID */ , TOP_NTCART_ID /*최상위게시물ID */ , NTCART_NM /*게시물명 */ , NTCART_CTNTS /*게시물내용 */ , ANSWER_CTNTS /*답변내용 */ , NOTE_STATUS_CD /*공지상태코드 */ , POST_STATUS_CD /*게시상태코드 */ , IFNULL(NOTE_YN,'N') NOTE_YN /*공지여부 */ , /*DATE_FORMAT(POST_STA_DT,'%Y%m%d')*/ POST_STA_DT /*게시시작일시 */ , /*DATE_FORMAT(POST_END_DT,'%Y%m%d')*/ POST_END_DT /*게시종료일시 */ , /*DATE_FORMAT(NOTE_STA_DT,'%Y%m%d')*/ NOTE_STA_DT /*공지시작일시 */ , /*DATE_FORMAT(NOTE_END_DT,'%Y%m%d')*/ NOTE_END_DT /*공지종료일시 */ , FILE_ID /*파일코드 */ , NTCART_PWD /*게시물비밀번호 */ , REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , AMD_DT /*수정일시 */ , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SYS_FILE_BAS WHERE FILE_ID = IFNULL(A.FILE_ID,A.NTCART_ID) ) FILE_CNT FROM TB_SYS_NTCART_BAS A
ORDER BY CASE WHEN TRIM(current_timestamp()) BETWEEN IFNULL(POST_STA_DT,STR_TO_DATE('19000101','%Y%m%d')) AND IFNULL(POST_END_DT,STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d')) THEN IFNULL(NOTE_YN,'N') ELSE 'A' END DESC , IFNULL(POST_END_DT,STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d')) DESC , IFNULL(POST_STA_DT,STR_TO_DATE('19000101','%Y%m%d')) , REG_DT DESC

SELECT /*com.wigo.cmm.sys.dao.NtcartBasDao.select*/ NTCART_ID /*게시물ID */ , BRD_ID /*게시판ID */ , UP_NTCART_ID /*상위게시물ID */ , TOP_NTCART_ID /*최상위게시물ID */ , NTCART_NM /*게시물명 */ , NTCART_CTNTS /*게시물내용 */ , ANSWER_CTNTS /*답변내용 */ , NOTE_STATUS_CD /*공지상태코드 */ , POST_STATUS_CD /*게시상태코드 */ , IFNULL(NOTE_YN,'N') NOTE_YN /*공지여부 */ , DATE_FORMAT(POST_STA_DT,'%Y%m%d') POST_STA_DT /*게시시작일시 */ , DATE_FORMAT(POST_END_DT,'%Y%m%d') POST_END_DT /*게시종료일시 */ , DATE_FORMAT(NOTE_STA_DT,'%Y%m%d') NOTE_STA_DT /*공지시작일시 */ , DATE_FORMAT(NOTE_END_DT,'%Y%m%d') NOTE_END_DT /*공지종료일시 */ , FILE_ID /*파일코드 */ , NTCART_PWD /*게시물비밀번호 */ , REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , AMD_DT /*수정일시 */ FROM TB_SYS_NTCART_BAS
